document_data.name: Beatrice
document_data.mainbody: '''Beatrice''' was a noblewoman of [[Cormyr]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: She was a cousin of King [[Azoun IV]] and the wife of [[Grodoveth]]. However, Grodoveth committed a wanton indiscretion (rumored to involve a [[prostitute]] in a Suzail tavern) that not only dishonored himself but embarrassed the throne and saw him exiled from the city as a lowly envoy by [[1367 DR]], and perhaps fortunately left Beatrice alone.
